alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 15 at 8:38PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet turning to all snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel may become hazardous due to snow and ice covered roads and at times very low visibility. This will affect both the Thursday morning and afternoon commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rates of snowfall greater than one inch per hour are possible. This combined with winds gusting as high as 35 mph could result hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
